ValidationRule.description: Prevents the status from being changed to 'submitted' if there are blank fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,'Submitted'), OR( ISBLANK( Any_Challenges_with_property__c ), ISBLANK( Building_Sub_Community__c ), ISBLANK( Community_facilities_features__c ), ISBLANK( Is_the_Listing_exclusive_non_exclusive__c ), ISBLANK( Key_Target_Audience__c ), ISBLANK( Key_USP_s__c ), ISBLANK( Kitchen_Description__c ), ISBLANK( Leisure_Entertainment_facilities__c ), ISBLANK( Listing_Price__c ), ISBLANK( ving_R__c ), ISBLANK( Notable_brands_in_the_property__c ), ISBLANK( Number_of_Bathrooms__c ), ISBLANK( Number_of_Bedrooms__c ), ISBLANK( TEXT(Property_Orientation__c )), ISBLANK( Property_outdoor_space__c ), ISBLANK( Property_Sub_Type__c ), ISBLANK( Ready_unit_Under_construction__c ), ISBLANK( Refurbishments_Upgrades__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All data fields must be completed before you can submit this. Please check if there are any blank fields and update them
